LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_ExtraN: While only being marginally more efficient than a normal lung, this lung is equipped with a series of filters, able to process out a large proportion of airborne toxins.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_Auxila: This auxilary heart increases the amount of oxygen going though the persons body, allowing them to function more efficiently.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_Combat: This gland injects a potent brew of combat drugs into the body, significantly increasing close combat capabilities.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_Hormon: This gland regulates the mood of the user, resulting in a more balanced mind.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_Lympha: This gland significantly boosts it's hosts immunizing capability, rendering them immune to most normal infectious agents.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_AbdominalAndChestcavity_RasVac: This gland inhibits the affects of aging. While it won't cure any existing conditions, it will stop the host from degrading further due to old age.\nIntegrating technology of this complexity requires more specialized research.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_FeatheredWings.label: <color=#00FFF7>feathered wings</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_FeatheredWings.descriptio: These wings are small but powerful enough to keep the user afloat.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_LeatheryWings.label: <color=#00FFF7>leathery wings</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_LeatheryWings.description: Leathery wings the user can protect themselves with.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_TentacleCluster.label: <color=#00FFF7>tentacle cluster</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_TentacleCluster.descripti: These protruding tentacles can be used to help in daily life.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_MusculatureBraces.label: <color=#00FFF7>musculature braces</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_MusculatureBraces.descrip: Adding additional bands of muscle and strentghened bone to attach them to allows the user to carry more and hit harder.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_PeltGrowth.label: <color=#00FFF7>pelt growth</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_PeltGrowth.description: A patch of pelt that warms the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_WaterFilledGrowth.label: <color=#00FFF7>water filled growth</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Back_WaterFilledGrowth.descrip: A growth filled with water that chills the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Brain_NeuralHyperthreader.desc: As a result of a redesign of the cranial nerve nucleus, the user can concentrate on multiple thoughts at the same time.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Brain_ButchersNails.label: <color=#00FFF7>butchers nails</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Brain_ButchersNails.descriptio: These imperfect organs are made to enhance the latent aggression of a being, turning them into a force of nature on the battlefield. However. their <color=#EB4034>constant desire to shed blood</color> makes them highly likely to run mad. <color=#EB4034>Use with caution.</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_PlagueLesions.label: <color=#00FFF7>plague lesions</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_PlagueLesions.descript: These lesions do not close and maintain the appearance of an open wound. Once the host takes damage however, they expel a noxious plague that infects whoever damaged the host in melee.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_ReinforcedTortoiseShel: These exceptionally durable shells line the torso of the host, providing exceptional protection. However, their weight slows down the host by a decent amount.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_ExtradextrousArm.des: By strengthening the muscles in the appendage and increasing fine nervous control, the entire performance of the appendage is increased.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_RendingClaw.label: <color=#00FFF7>rending claw</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_RendingClaw.descript: While being less dextrous than the extradextrous appendage, the sharp talons also increase the hosts ability to fight back.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_HighPressurePincer.d: The claws on this limb are made of the toughest chitin, as well as being backed by muscles stronger than most animal jaws. The end result is a pincer that can wrench though any metal to destroy what lies inside.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_SonicImpactMace.desc: This limb is created out of a mass of strengthened bone, with an intricate series of holes that serves to amplify sound. This results in a mace that creates a large disorienting soundwave on impact.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_VenopillarArm.label: <color=#00FFF7>venopillar arm</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_VenopillarArm.descri: An arm with a parotid gland that contains a potent venom and sharp nails.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_FrostMantisHook.desc: The tip of this limb has a nasty hook with the ability to flash freeze.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_SalamanderWhip.label: <color=#00FFF7>salamander whip</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_SalamanderWhip.descr: This limb is very flexible and it's core can be superheated when needed.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_OssifiedBoneSaber.de: By creating sharp bone growths that naturally keep themselves unnaturally sharp, an appendage can be created that is more lethal than any sword.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_TriPlacedLimb.label: <color=#00FFF7>tri plated limb</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_TriPlacedLimb.descri: A limb with a focus on toughness.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_ReinforcedLeg.label: <color=#00FFF7>reinforced leg</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_ReinforcedLeg.descri: By reinforcing the muscles and bones, legs that allow for more weight capacity and speed can be created.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_GraspingLeg.label: <color=#00FFF7>grasping leg</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_GraspingLeg.descript: Imitating our genetic relatives, this leg has a hand instad of a foot.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_ShireHorseLeg.label: <color=#00FFF7>shire horse leg</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_ShireHorseLeg.descri: A very sturdy leg that supports an extreme amount of weight at the cost of speed.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_WeightedTail.label: <color=#00FFF7>weigthed tail</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Appendage_WeightedTail.descrip: A tail with a heavy growth at the end. This helps the user to maneuver.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Tail_VenomousStinger.label: <color=#00FFF7>venomous stinger</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Tail_VenomousStinger.descripti: A tail with a stringer at the tip that contains a potent venom.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Heart_TriwovenPrimaryHeart.des: By weaving muscles in an overlapping pattern the heart gains more control about the volume and speed of blood flow.
This ingenious designed system filters blood thrice without a drop in performance.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Kidney_PerspirationCleansingKi: These highly specialized kidneys clean sweat and other emissions to reduce the odour of the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Lung_NanoAlveoliLung.label: <color=#00FFF7>nano alveoli lung</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Lung_NanoAlveoliLung.descripti: By decreasing the area and increasing the amount of alveoli, the internal gas transfer is performed a lot quicker.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Stomach_MultichamberStomach.de: By separating digestion into specialized chambers, the effiency of processing food is increased.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Liver_QuadlobeLiver.label: <color=#00FFF7>quadlobe liver</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Liver_QuadlobeLiver.descriptio: By decreasing the size of the cells, the lobes can be doubled without the user noticing any difference.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Liver_RegenerativeLiver.label: <color=#00FFF7>regenerative liver</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Liver_RegenerativeLiver.descri: By optimizing the cellular processes of cell proliferation, morphogenesis and cell differentiation of the human body, this liver can increase the latent regenerative abilities of the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Spine_NeuroAcceleratedSpine.de: While the gila coating increased signal transmission speed massively, of higher significance are the secondary processing nodules which allows the spinal cord to process less complex signals on it's own to free up the brain.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_MultispectrumEye.label: <color=#00FFF7>multispectrum eye</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_MultispectrumEye.descripti: By integrating cells that allow for collection of light in the ultraviolent and infrared spectrum, these eyes allow for much more spacial awareness of their host.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_IridescentEye.label: <color=#00FFF7>iridescent eye</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_IridescentEye.description: The colours of this eye swirl and change constantly.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Nose_MicroAnalyzerNose.label: <color=#00FFF7>micro analyzer nose</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Nose_MicroAnalyzerNose.descrip: Increasing the amount of cells dedicated to analyzing specific molecules, certain scents can be more easily distinguished from surrounding gasses.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Nose_PheromoneReleaserNose.des: By adding special pheromone glands to the base of the nose, the host can slightly alter the disposition of those they are communicating with.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Ear_MultifrequencyEar.label: <color=#00FFF7>multifrequency ear</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Ear_MultifrequencyEar.descript: By increasing the range of receivable frequencies and giving the user the ability to focus on certain frequencies, the user is even able to hear muscles move.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_DistendableJaw.label: <color=#00FFF7>distendable jaw</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_DistendableJaw.description: This jaw is inspired by cranial kinesis and allows the user to increase the ingestion speed.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_VenomousFangs.label: <color=#00FFF7>venomous fangs</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Jaw_VenomousFangs.description: By altering the parotid salivary glands and adding hoolow fangs, the user is able to poison with a bite.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skull_PsychicResona: By placing a layer of psychically sensitive tissue around the skull, the host becomes more attuned to psychic fields, allowing them to cast more abilities before overheating.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skull_InterferenceS: By carefully wrapping the brain in a psychic resistant material, the user can be made immune to its effect.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Torso_MultilayeredD: By layering chitin plates under the skin and binding cracks with rubbery flesh, resistance to small arms fire is radically increased.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skin_FlameRetardant: By lining the skin with glands that can quickly release flame retardant slime on the body as well as dissipating heat, the user becomes extremely resistant to heat and flame.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skin_VariableInsula: By creating skin with both high-volume sweat glands and hairs that can either retain or release heat, the user becomes comfortable in a massive range of temperatures.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skin_ShimmeringSkin: Skin that glows with a subdued light.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skin_RadiationAbsor: Skin tissue that absorbs radiation out of the body and sheds itself before it can grow cancerous growth.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Skin_PhytoplanktonS: This skin generates energy via photosynthesis and passes it onto the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Ribcage_CalciumAllo: By altering the composition of the ribcage into a calcium and metal alloy, and encasing the upper body in an organic rubber analogue, the durability of the upper body is immensely increased.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Protection_Neck_ReinforcedNeck: Reinforces the neck muscles with plasteel threads.
LanguageData.EVOR_Building_Cellbench.label: organ growing workbench
LanguageData.EVOR_Building_Cellbench.description: A place to grow organs that are far more capable than what nature would have given us.
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Protein.label: protein slag
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Protein.description: A vial of animal proteins ready to be synthesized with mechanites and formed into specialized appendages or organs.
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Mechanites.label: nano mechanites
LanguageData.EVOR_Resource_Mechanites.description: A vial of nanomachines ready to be used to modify a mass of cells into specialized appendages or organs.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_ReproductiveOrgans.label: efficient copulation extremity
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_ReproductiveOrgans.description: I cannot imagine what "features" this has to make it so much better than what nature gave you.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Swim.label: hydrophobic webbed leg
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Leg_Swim.description: By creating a new cellular mesh that is both light and durable, it is possible to create a mesh that allows for leg mounted webbing that doesnt tear easily.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_MaggotBolter.label: voracious maggot bolter
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_MaggotBolter.description: By creating a rapidly growing strain of maggots and adapting them to life in our bodies, we can use them as bullet-like ammunition in our bio-weapons.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_VenomCrystal.label: venom crystal cannon
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_VenomCrystal.description: The crystals fired from this cannon are made of a durable chunk of solid venom, able to punch through the strongest armor and then eat though anything underneath.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_CryoSlime.label: cryogenic slime cannon
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_CryoSlime.description: This limb fires a carefully cooled bodily fluid that rapidly cools the target upon impact, in some cases chilling the enemy to the bone
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_ImpulseShock.label: impulse shock blaster
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_ImpulseShock.description: Instead of being tuned to be a lethal shock, the electrified rods fired by this limb are tuned to incapacitate, working equally well on organic and mechanical targets
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_KaboomSpore.label: volatile spore array
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_KaboomSpore.description: These spores on the host's back can be launched in a certain direction, where they glide to the target and explode.
LanguageData.EVOR_Bullet_Maggot.label: voracious maggot
LanguageData.EVOR_Bullet_VenomCrystal.label: venom crystal
LanguageData.EVOR_Bullet_CryoSlime.label: cryogenic slime
LanguageData.EVOR_Bullet_ImpulseShock.label: impulse shock
LanguageData.EVOR_Bullet_KaboomSpore.label: volatile spore
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Rad.label: radiation suppressor
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Abd_Rad.description: An organ developed to release protective protiens which insulate cells from radiation damage as well as filtering and replacing irradiated tissue.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_NornCrown.label: <color=#00FFF7>norn crown</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_NornCrown.description: Despite the name, the Norn Crown is actually a writing mass of psychically tuned flesh. Implanted in the sternum, it allows the user to change the moods of beings around them.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Sternum_ReactiveShimmerworms.d: Once these worms feel pain, they immediately make themselves psychically invisible to anyone around them. By melding their nervous system with the host, the worms now cause the host to be invisible whenever the host feels pain.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Torso_MucousGland.label: <color=#00FFF7>mucous gland</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Torso_MucousGland.description: A gland that releases a slimy film all over the body that helps deflecting blows. Others will be disgusted by the user.
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_EyeOfTheVoid.label: <color=#00FFF7>eye of the void</color>
LanguageData.EVOR_Item_Eye_EyeOfTheVoid.description: Eyes with extra wide pupils. While this improves sight in the dark, the user still prefers the light of the day.
